name: The Squire
description:
You are the trainee squire of a group of adventurers, although no one warned you that you would have to do the hard work.
The risk is not your thing, but the promised pay seems good.
You will have to find and help your teammates to reach the end of the dark lord's dungeon, and get out safely.

"The Squire" is an adventure game in which you will have to find and help your companions, solving puzzles to kill the minions that get in your way, until you reach the depths of the dungeon.

Can you pass the trial period?

GAME FEATURES:

- Point and Click exploration adventure.
- Pixelart aesthetics in 3D environments.
- Dialogues and cinematics loaded with humor.
- 13 dungeons to overcome.
- Arcade levels in which you must stop the minions.
- Show your great experience with levers.
- Clever puzzles and labyrinthine levels
